JobTitle: Sr Product Manager - Carrier Experience - Uber Freight
JobFullDesc: About the RoleUber Freight connects shippers with truckers, much like how Uber connects riders and drivers. We are a team of sharp, entrepreneurial individuals who are redefining the movement of things around the world. On the Uber Freight team, we fiercely believe that our dedication to transportation technologies will bring more harmonious, highly efficient, and increasingly safer transportation logistics to our roads. Uber Freight is looking for a Sr Product Manager to join the Carrier Experience team that's responsible for the success of our carrier base (fleets of truck drivers). Truck drivers are the most common job in over 30 states and are the supply in our two-sided marketplace. Your scope will consist of understanding the main issues that drivers have while on-trip and develop tools and automations to remove or simplify these on-trip defects. You will build into our carrier app, carrier web portal, and tools for our internal support team. If you are a customer-obsessed and data-driven PM, this is the perfect role for you. What the Candidate Will DoUse data-driven methodologies to solve challenging pain points for carriers.Define and communicate product plans from conception to launch.Analyze the results of a launch and create the plan to iterate and build new features.Prioritize features based on business impact and available resources.Contribute to technical conversations around deadlines and engineering solutions.Drive product research priorities for the research team.Develop objectives and key results (OKRs) to build short, medium, and long-term product roadmaps that take products from conception through launch and growthRepresent Uber in meetings with leadership and events to evangelize Uber Freight's products and capabilitiesBasic QualificationsExperience building 0 to 1 products, or scaling existing products. (B2B / B2C)Experience working alongside design teams / UX exposure along with cross-functional counterparts
